Yard House is the modern Public House where food and beer lovers unite. Yard House is located in Red Rock Casino, Resort and Spa, the resort that is redefining the Las Vegas resort experience. restaurantDescription: If you're looking for a Times Square restaurant with the best variety of draft beer, look no further than the Yard House in New York City located on W 41st Street between 7th Avenue and Broadway. Centrally located near many Times Square hotels, including the Margaritaville Resort NYC and The Knickerbocker. Plus, we’re 1.5 blocks from Bryant Park. Come and experience great food, classic rock and the world's largest selection of draft beer. We’ve got New American-style dishes for lunch, dinner and late night food. We’re talking appetizers, burgers, seafood, plus vegan, vegetarian, and gluten-free food options. Get yourself a signature half yard of sour beer, stout beer, IPA beer, or even non-alcoholic beer. With over 130 taps, the NYC fun is sure to be bottomless.  So if you’re looking for the best of Times Square bars and restaurants, look no further. Interested in NYC private events venues or a private events room? We’ve got you covered there, too. Visit us at 10 Times Square today.
